item.description:
the Yale Repertory Theatre is offering a special deal for next thursday's performance of "The Unmentionables."

tickets for the show are $25 each (that's $20 off the regular price), and there is a free pizza party and African Breeze drink specials at BAR (254 Crown St) starting at 6pm.

call the ticket office at the rep at 203-432-1234 and mention "African Breeze" to get the special ticket price and get your name put on the list at BAR.

the performance begins at 8pm.

your contact for the evening: Jacques Lamarre (the connection, works for Yale rep, will be at BAR and the show) 860-965-9418.
item.name: Thurs. 5/17 - "The Unmentionables" at Yale Rep and Free Pizza at BAR
